templates.name: How to Find Books
templates.text:
To find books in our library:

1. Use our online catalog at library.example.com
2. Search by title, author, or subject
3. Note the call number and location
4. Visit the shelf or request it at the desk

Need help finding something specific?

templates.text:

templates.text:
Don't have what you need? We can request it from other libraries!

‚Ä¢ Free service for cardholders

templates.text:

templates.name: Printing Instructions
templates.text:
To print at the library:

1. Send your document to library-print@example.com
2. Go to any print station
3. Enter your library card number
4. Select your document and print

Cost: $0.10/page B&W, $0.25/page color

Need help with printing?

templates.name: Computer Reservations
templates.text:
Reserve a computer:

‚Ä¢ Online: library.example.com/computers
‚Ä¢ In person: Ask at the desk
‚Ä¢ By phone: (555) 123-4567

Sessions are 2 hours, renewable if available.

Would you like to reserve one now?

templates.name: Scanner Help
templates.text:
To use our scanners:

1. Place document face-down on glass
2. Select scan settings on screen
3. Choose email or USB save
4. Free for library users!

Need assistance with scanning?

templates.text:

templates.text:
